page.title: 07Entertainment
page.content: Dereham has 230 clubs and societies covering a varied range of interests, including:- Girl Guides, Boy Scouts, Boys and Girls Brigades, Youth Club, Clubs for Swimming, Tennis, Table Tennis, Football, Cricket and Yoga. Young Farmers, Play Groups, Rugby Club, Wine and Beer Clubs, Round Table, Save the Children etc The Corn Exchange Building has facilities for a cinema and a large hall downstairs where Bingo is played several evenings a week. Several Bands are to be found in the town:- Town Band, British Legion, Salvation Army, Neatherd High School, Baptist Boys Brigade. Dereham Operatic and Drama Company presents Musicals and Plays at the Memorial Hall.
